title: Australian diary. No. 008
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The progress made by sheep breeders is evident at the Sydney Sheep show. A burnt-out forest is salvaged for paper making in Victoria. John Seufert, a blind and handless soldier refuses to let his disability defeat him. Burrinjuck Dam provides water for irrigation in the Murrumbidgee River area.
